generated_body: The article is likely to provide an overview of the modifications made by Steeda to the Bullitt Mustang, focusing on the enhancements that transform the car into the Steve McQueen Edition. Readers can expect details about performance upgrades, design changes, and unique features that pay homage to the late actor. Additionally, the article may explore the historical significance of the Bullitt car in film and its cultural impact, as well as insights into Steeda's reputation in the automotive aftermarket industry.
